lemma robdd_invar_ext_weaken : assumes pre: "robdd_invar_ext bs2 n b" and bs2_props: "\<And>b2. b \<in> subrobdds_set bs2 \<Longrightarrow> b2 \<in> bs1 \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>b1 \<in> bs2. b2 \<in> (subrobdds b1)" and b_in: "b \<in> subrobdds_set bs2 \<Longrightarrow> b \<in> subrobdds_set bs1" and m_le: "m \<le> n" shows "robdd_invar_ext bs1 m b"
